News.headline: 50/50 Draw Bromley FC
News.short_description: The winner for the Daggers' Vanarama National League game versus Bromley FC is ticket number 06069
News.description:
The winning ticket worth £150.00 was drawn at half time. The winning ticket was claimed by Joe & Liv

Second place winner for the £50 Johnstone's Paint voucher is ticket number 05896, which was claimed by John Coombs. 

50/50 tickets can be purchased on match days for £1.
